thread.section_title: POP Yachts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of POP Yachts | popyachts.com
thread.title: Amanda C.
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by Amanda C.

author: Amanda C.
title: Amanda C.
text:
I would like to praise my team for helping me sale the boat. Greg and Rusty worked diligently to make the experience smooth and easy for me.
Greg took great pictures and provided exceptional tips on what else I could do to spruce up the site more. I had planned on getting a video of the boat in action but it sold before I got a chance. Feedback was spot on from Greg! Props for sure.
Rusty continued communication after we found a buyer what seemed like daily. He was very informative and made me feel comfortable about the seller/buyer experience.
I will definitely recommend PopYachts in the future to any friends in my Boating Community whether it's buying or selling with the company. I have warm fuzzies about the company as a whole.
Thanks, so much, for all the hard work and the business model for continuing to strive for Excellence.
